The AI Starter Kits Experience

LEARN

Validated methodologies for different industrial use cases, based on years of research and experience, bundled in a ready-to-use AI Starter Kit

EXPERIMENT

Get familiar with the different steps in our AI methodology in an interactive notebook

INNOVATE

Hands-on training and individual expert support to arrive at a tailored AI innovation roadmap for your own company context

Explore our Starter Kits library

Starter Kits

Concretely, the Starter Kits are self-contained collections of autodidactic material, providing a description of a specific data innovation topic in terms of its business goal, data-related requirements & challenges, relevant data science tasks, etc.
